pages.title: Censer
pages.text: Burns pairs of magical herbs to create area auras. Insert two different $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Core Herbs$(/l), ignite with Flint & Steel, and the effect radiates for several minutes.

pages.title: Block Overview
pages.text: $(li)Insert two different Core Herbs (order doesn't matter).$(br)$(li)Ignite with Flint & Steel; only lights on valid combos.$(br)$(li)Extinguish early with a Shovel.$(br)$(li)Herbs are consumed on light.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(li)Place the Censer.$(br)$(li)Right-click with two different Core Herbs.$(br)$(li)Light with Flint & Steel to begin the aura.$(br)$(li)Applies the effect to all entities in range.

pages.title: Herb Combinations (1/2)
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)Fireproof Presence$(): Siren Kelp + Spirit Bloom$(br)$(li)$(thing)Undead Veil$(): Ghost Fern + Spirit Bloom$(br)$(li)$(thing)Livestock Comfort$(): Ghost Fern + Siren Kelp

pages.title: Herb Combinations (2/2)
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)Miner's Respite$(): Dreamshroom + Spirit Bloom$(br)$(li)$(thing)Fisher's Boon$(): Dreamshroom + Siren Kelp$(br)$(li)$(thing)Suction Zone$(): Dreamshroom + Ghost Fern

pages.title: Fireproof Presence
pages.text: Extinguishes flames and grants Fire Resistance in the area—great for Nether excursions or wooden bases.

pages.title: Undead Veil
pages.text: Pacifies undead mobs (Zombies, Skeletons, etc.), causing them to lose targets and stop attacking. Brief glow highlights affected mobs.

pages.title: Livestock Comfort
pages.text: Accelerates baby animal growth significantly—ideal for automated or semi-automated farms.

pages.title: Miner's Respite
pages.text: Grants Night Vision and Haste II to miners; also slowly repairs damaged Anvils nearby.

pages.title: Fisher's Boon
pages.text: Subtly improves fishing rewards while within the aura.

pages.title: Suction Zone
pages.text: Pulls items toward Hoppers; if none exist, items are drawn to the nearest player—easy cleanup.

pages.title: Unlocking
pages.text: All Censer effects are available once you craft or obtain a $(thing)Censer$().
